TopicTitle: Company of Heroes 2 Official release in 5 hours.

Articles.Content:
Well I'm not sleeping tonight I guess.

And just as I had turned around my initial terrible sleeping schedule at the start of summer vacation, god damn it.

Anyway, I've been looking forward to this for quite some time, never got around to participating in the open beta though, laziness and not being willing to take a ton of time with my terrible terrible internet to download the huge game file that it was going to be.

How about you guys? Anyone else looking forward to getting back on the virtual World War 2 front in the bird-eyes-view?

Also: Inb4 anyone gets butthurt because the series aren't as realistic as they could be (at all); I know, and I think everyone else knows as well, so no need for the obvious information.
